Posts.EditableText: I have an object that when selected displays a duplicate option. It's used to change player settings. In this case, it's the name. It displays both "Change Name" and "changename" as separate options and I don't know why.
Posts.HTML: I have an object that when selected displays a duplicate option. It's used to change player settings. In this case, it's the name. It displays both "Change Name" and "changename" as separate options and I don't know why.
